channel.title: Not really server help... But it's for the server I guess
channel.description:
Alright, i'm trying to set up a template. More specific, a a runescape 2007, template, when runescape was actually cool and un-laggy.
I downloaded this one php one, and it just doesn't want to work. So if you could help me and you're good with PHP please let me know. (: Because I need all the help I can on creating this so that I have something that looks beast. The old site I used to play, has it, but i'm having trouble getting the MYSQL to work on 000webhost.com.
So if you can help, please do send me a message.
Demon6994 <--- Skype Demon6994@live.com <-- Self explanatory.
